FFC
================

## What is this project?

Inspired by Zach Muller’s [Walk with fastai](walkwithfastai.com),
**Fred’s fast.ai cookbook** aims to collect notebooks, snippets, ideas
and learnings of my personal [fastai journey](/blog).

## Install

``` sh
pip install -e '.[dev]'
```
